About Me

I'm currently enrolled in WashU's web development bootcamp to further my knowledge of coding. I have always been a fan of puzzles and once I pick one up I become slightly obsessed until it's complete and that's exactly how I feel about coding. If there is an obstacle in my way I will move that obstacle or find a way around it.
